Thank You!

Welcome to Ohio Natural Gas!

Switch to Ohio Natural Gas (ONG) and start earning with Delta SkyMiles®. Ohio Natural Gas is excited to be a Delta SkyMiles partner and the only Gas Supplier in Ohio with whom you can earn miles just for paying your natural gas bill.

Delta Skymiles Member InformationRequired*

Forgot your Skymiles Number?

How It Works

  • Customers will now earn TWO miles for every dollar spent on their ONG supplier natural gas charges (excluding sales tax and one-time charges)!
  • And, if you are a Delta SkyMiles® Medallion® member, Delta will award an additional mile for each dollar spent as described above!
  • It’s easy to start participating. Simply enter your ONG account and SkyMiles member information below. If you’d prefer to enroll by phone, call ONG (toll-free) at 1-888-466-4427 and mention that you would like to enroll in ONG’s Delta SkyMiles partnership program. Please have your SkyMiles account number handy when you call.
Frequently Asked Questions > Program Terms & Conditions > Join Delta Skymiles >

Don’t have your skymiles Number at the Moment?

If you do not have your Delta Skymiles Number with you, you may enter it later. You have until xx/xx/xxxx to get us your Skymiles number. Instructions on how they can give it to you later should display here.
